item.description:
Unfortunately there are some repairs going on Fenway Bark in the area where we usually meet and the RSVP list was light (we need 8 frenchies to cover costs) so I decided to cancel the Fenway Bark meet up and move to Peter's Park. Since the weather looks a little better early in the weekend I also changed the date so get ready for a SATURDAY meetup at Peter's Park!

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie... I am out of town and I will not be there to collect so please make a mental note of what you owe and hopefully you can pay at a later date or as soon as I set up a way to pay online.

Your frenchie's canine brothers, sisters and friends are more than welcome to join us at the park! Please abide by the weight/size limits posted at the entrance to the small and larger dog entrances.

Get your meetup on and come join the fun, there is plenty of metered parking right on Washington St next to the park!

For those that signed up for the Fenway Bark meetup on Sunday I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.

Thanks so much, Zeek!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: **Change Of Date & Venue** October French Bulldog Meetup
